channel.title: Need help putting server online
channel.description: hey all i need help putting a rsps online i got teamview so if someone would help me put online ill give rsgp i cant seem to get the screen up when u put your ip address in the internet, sooo, someone help me with TV? im new to it, sooo please help!! :confused:

item.title: Need help putting server online
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

Did you port forward?
Do you have a no-ip?
If yes, then just go into ur client folder , open up client.java and search ( Hit ctrl F)
and search for “server =”
Make sure theres a space between server and =
Then in the quotations just put your no-ip in it … save and compile
Then go to ur desktop ( where ur client should be )
Right click your client folder and hit “add to …client” it should say add to whatever your client’s name is… then it will make a winrar file for players to download … go to uppit,com or media fire,com and upload that winrar file … then that link they give u is what u give to ur players to download.
Now go back into ur client.java and change the server = back to 127.0.0.1 , or 0.0.0.0 which ever one you use ( probably 127.0.0.1 )
Then save and compile and make sure your source is running or else players won’t be able to connect to ur server.

If u haven’t port forwarded watch these vids and make sure ur speakers are on , there commentaries



Your welcome.

Read full topic
